alert.note: Alert for Cook; DuPage (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 9:08AM CDT until July 26 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern DuPage County in northeastern Illinois... Northern Cook County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 907 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Libertyville to Inverness to near Sleepy Hollow, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chicago, Elgin, Cicero, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Skokie, Des Plaines, Berwyn, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Oak Park, Elmhurst, Lombard, Bartlett, Ohare Airport, Streamwood, Hanover Park, Park Ridge and Addison. This includes... Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, Schaumburg Boomers Baseball, Triton College, Northeastern Illinois University, Soldier Field, University of Illinois Chicago, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum Campus, and Northerly Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
